metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20170 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** OpenStack Keystone through 14.0.1 has a user enumeration vulnerability because invalid usernames have much faster responses than valid ones for a POST /v3/auth/tokens request. NOTE: the vendor's position is that this is a hardening opportunity, and not necessarily an issue that should have an OpenStack Security Advisory.

criterions.comment: keystone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
